spec_data.Name: texlive-zhspacing
spec_data.Description:
The package manages spacing in a CJK document; between
consecutive Chinese letters, spaces are ignored, but a
consistent space is inserted between Chinese text and English
(or mathematics). The package may be used by any document
format under XeTeX.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sun 06 Aug 2017 08:01:43 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Spacing for mixed CJK-English documents in XeTeX
